list.title: 📋 Department List
list.empty_message: Create the first department using the "Create Department" button

branch.label: 🏛️ Branch *:
branch.help: 🏢 The company has multiple branches. Select which one this department belongs to.

gps.allow_title: 📱 Allow GPS check-in from Employee APK
gps.allow_help: If enabled, employees can check in from their mobile phone (APK) when within the department's coverage radius
gps.section_help: ⚠️ Select the EXACT location of the physical department (not your current location). Use the map or enter coordinates manually.
gps.map_error: ⚠️ Error loading map. Use manual coordinates.
gps.tip: 💡 Tip: Drag the marker 📍 on the map to adjust the location. The yellow circle shows the coverage radius (area where check-in is allowed).

kiosks.title: 🖥️ Authorized Physical Kiosks (optional):
kiosks.help: 📍 Select which physical kiosks employees can use to check in (in addition to GPS if enabled)
kiosks.mixed_mode: ℹ️ Mixed Mode: You can enable GPS + Kiosks. Employees can use any enabled option.

validation.branch_required: ❌ You must select a branch. The company has multiple branches.
validation.name_min_length: ❌ Name must be at least 2 characters long
validation.one_option_required:
❌ You must enable at least ONE option:
- Allow GPS from APK, OR
- Select at least one authorized physical kiosk
validation.gps_coordinates_required:
❌ If you allow GPS, you must enter the department location coordinates.
Use the map or enter coordinates manually.
validation.gps_radius_required: ❌ If you allow GPS, coverage radius must be between 10 and 1000 meters
validation.gps_coordinates_invalid: ❌ If GPS check-in is enabled, you must provide valid coordinates.
validation.radius_invalid: ❌ Coverage radius must be between 10 and 1000 meters

confirm.delete_title: ❓ Are you sure you want to delete the department "{{name}}"?
confirm.delete_warning: ⚠️ WARNING: This action cannot be undone.
confirm.delete_consequence: Users assigned to this department will be left without a department.

list.title: Shift List
list.load_prompt: Press "Shift List" to load configured shifts...
list.no_shifts_message: Create the first shift using the "Create Advanced Shift" button

form.tolerance_help: Configure the allowed tolerance minutes before and after the established time
form.tolerance_example_entry: Ex: 15 min = can clock in from 07:45
form.tolerance_example_late: Ex: 10 min = can clock in until 08:10
form.tolerance_example_exit: Ex: 10 min = can clock out from 16:50
form.tolerance_example_stay: Ex: 30 min = can clock out until 17:30
form.tolerance_important: Important: These values are specific to this shift and respect multi-tenant policy. Each company can configure its own tolerances according to its work policy.

calendar.title: Shift Calendar
calendar.description: Will display shifts by day with color coding

hourly_config.title: Hours and Rates Configuration
hourly_config.description: Configuration of rates by hour type...

validation.rotative_pattern_required: Complete pattern and start date for rotative shift
validation.flash_dates_required: Complete start and end dates for flash shift
validation.select_one_user: Must select at least one user
validation.select_one_shift: Must select at least one shift

confirm.delete_title: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?
confirm.assign_shifts: Do you want to assign {{shiftCount}} shift(s) to {{userCount}} selected user(s)?

attendance.title: 📋 Advanced Attendance Control
attendance.click_refresh_to_load: Click "🔄 Refresh" to load today's attendance data
attendance.detection_logs_description: Complete record of ALL face detections (even those that didn't generate clock-in due to cooldown)
attendance.click_load_logs: Click "🔄 Load Logs" to view detection records
attendance.no_data_for_filters: ℹ️ No attendance data for selected filters
attendance.error_connection: ❌ Connection error. Please check your internet connection.
attendance.no_records_to_show: ℹ️ No attendance records to show
attendance.no_detection_logs: ℹ️ No detection logs to show

messages.file_too_large: Image is too large. Maximum 5MB allowed.
messages.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the user's photo?

steps.valence: Processing emotional valence with Russell's Circumplex...

results.title: Harvard Emotional Analysis Results
results.insight: Harvard Insight: Excellent emotional state. Employee shows signs of well-being and job satisfaction. Recommendation: Maintain current conditions.

results.title: Stanford Sleep Lab Results
results.recommendation: Stanford Recommendation: Employee shows excellent alertness state. No preventive measures required. Continue with routine monitoring.

results.title: MIT CSAIL Results
results.conclusion: MIT Result: Employee presents completely normal behavior. No signs of aggression, violence or behavioral anomalies. Optimal security profile.

who.title: WHO Global Digital Health Index - Assessment

results.title: WHO-GDHI Assessment Results

quick_access.title: Quick Access
quick_access.no_modules: Quick access modules will load once you have available modules

notifications.modules_available_desc: Click on any module to access its functionalities

help.guide_content:
1. Use the modules in the top bar
2. Each module has specific functionalities
3. Data is isolated by company
4. For technical support, use the contact button
help.support_content:
You can contact technical support through:
- Email: support@company.com
- Phone: +1 555 1234-5678
- Internal ticket system

server.title: 📡 Server Configuration for APK
server.subtitle: Use this information to configure the Flutter APK manually

art.title: 🚨 Multiple ART Configuration

licenses.interruptible_label: Vacations can be interrupted by illness

modal_schedule.title: 📋 Automatic Vacation Schedule
modal_schedule.algorithm_desc: The system has analyzed each employee's tasks and generated a schedule that ensures coverage of all critical activities during vacation periods.
